member.name: T:ConstantContactBO.ContactList
member.summary: Contains information's about a Constant Contact List

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._name
member.summary: The list name

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._shortName
member.summary: System-calculated display name for the list for use where space is limited

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._optInDefault
member.summary: If true, Contacts who sign-up or change their settings may add themselves to this list

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._sortOrder
member.summary:
Relative position of this Contact List in the full set of Contact Lists.
This parameter is used when a group of Contact Lists are presented in a UI such as the Site Visitor SignUp. The values are arbitrary relative values. A List with SortOrder=25 will be shown after a List with Sort Order 15.

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._id
member.summary: Id of Contact List

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._link
member.summary: Edit link of Contact List

member.name: F:ConstantContactBO.ContactList._systemList
member.summary: Specified the type of Constant Contact system predefined list

member.summary: Constructor with no parameters

member.summary: Constructor with list name and optInDefault

member.summary: Constructor with list id

member.summary: Gets or sets the list name

member.summary: Gets the system-calculated display name for the list for use where space is limited

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.ContactList.OptInDefault
member.summary: If true, Contacts who sign-up or change their settings may add themselves to this list

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.ContactList.SortOrder
member.summary:
Gets or sets the relative position of this Contact List in the full set of Contact Lists.
This parameter is used when a group of Contact Lists are presented in a UI such as the Site Visitor SignUp. The values are arbitrary relative values. A List with SortOrder=25 will be shown after a List with Sort Order 15.

member.summary: Email address entry represents From address shows the address that the email originated from

member.summary: ID Email address entry represents From address shows the address that the email originated from

member.summary: Email address entry represents the field used by an email client's reply function

member.summary: ID Email address entry represents the field used by an email client's reply function

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.ViewAsWebpage
member.summary: This allows contacts who cannot view images in their email program to open your email in a browser window.

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.ViewAsWebpageLinkText
member.summary: The text for the actual link in the View As Webpage link in the email

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.ViewAsWebpageText
member.summary: The text displayed together with the LinkText at the top of your email

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.PermissionReminder
member.summary: Whether to show a permission reminder at the top of the email allowing recipients to confirm their opt in.

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.PermissionReminderText
member.summary: Permission reminder.

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.GreetingSalutation
member.summary: Describes the chosen salutation to be used at the opening of the email (e.g. Dear)

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.GreetingName
member.summary: Indicates if the email greeting should include just the recipients FirstName, just the LastName, Both, or neither (None)

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.GreetingString
member.summary: Allows you to specify the full greeting string instead of the components of the previous two properties.

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.OrganizationName
member.summary: Name of organization for use in the email footer

member.summary: Line 1 of the organization address for use in the email footer

member.summary: Line 3 of the organization address for use in the email footer

member.summary: City of the organization for use in the email footer

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.OrganizationState
member.summary: State of the organization for use in the email footer

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.OrganizationInternationalState
member.summary: International "State" if outside the US for use in the email footer

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.OrganizationPostalCode
member.summary: PostalCode/Zipcode of the organization for use in the email footer

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.OrganizationCountry
member.summary: Country of the organization for use in the email footer

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.IncludeForwardEmail
member.summary: Boolean type property that indicates if the email should include a Forward This Email link

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.ForwardEmailLinkText
member.summary: If IncludeForwardEmail property is set to YES, then this property should be specified and will appear in the email as the text of the link

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.IncludeSubscribeLink
member.summary: Boolean type property that indicates if the email should include a Subscribe link

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.SubscribeLinkText
member.summary: If IncludeSubscribeLink property is set to YES, then this property should be specified and will appear in the email as the text of the link

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.Content
member.summary: The full HTML content of the email

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.XContent
member.summary: The full XHTML content of the email

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.TextContent
member.summary: The text version of the email content. Will be used for email clients that do not have HTML email capability or have it disabled.

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.URLS
member.summary: Collection of URL entries that were included in this email for click tracking purposes

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.ContactLists
member.summary: Collection of ContactList entries that are associated with this email Campaign

member.name: P:ConstantContactBO.Entities.EmailCampaign.EmailContentFormat
member.summary: Describes whether email content is based on HTML or XHTML.
